    Playing Go

    less than 1 minute read

    Every once in a while, I get chance to play a game of go with my son, and despite him only wanting to play every couple of months, he always improves, while I don’t. He’s down to a 4 or 5 stone handicap now. Here is the final state of a recent game he won (I didn’t record the captures). As is often the case, I have trouble making life in the corners when playing against a handicap; something I need to work on.

    This post also serves to test the Eidogo plugin on my new blog - it works nicely :)
